contest-event.event-date:
July 12, 2015 D Shirebrook - Brass in the Bandstand
Shirebrook Open Entertainment Contest (Section A) 0 Entertainments Contest Shirebrook Open Entertainment Contest shirebrook-brass-in-the-bandstand
Entertainments Contest
Shirebrook Town Park, Shirebrook, Mansfield, Nottinghamshire, England, UK With a first prize of £750, podium awards of £400, £200 and a 'Most Entertaining Performance' prize of £200, there is also plenty of cash up for grabs too. The contest will start in Shirebrook Town Park at midday - and with no registration, and free entry open to contesting and non-contesting bands, it is being held to encourage bands to come and enjoy the musical experience of providing a 30 minute entertainment programme.
Once the contest as taken place it would be appreciated if someone from each band would undertake to inform me of their programme. So that it can be included on the website.
May 20, 2015, 11:42 a.m. July 13, 2015, 10:59 a.m.
1 Enderby Band Simon Gresswell
2 Unite the Union (City of Sheffield) David Hirst
3 South Yorkshire Police Band Leigh Baker
4 Shirebrook Band Mark Wilcockson
5 Ireland Colliery Chesterfield Band Ian Knapton
6 Market Rasen (RESDEV) Band David Dernley
7 Rolls Royce (Derby) Band Graham Cardwell
8 Dinnington Colliery Band Jonathan Beatty
Withdrawn Oughtibridge Band Gavin Somerset
Withdrawn Hatfield Band Stan Lippeatt
